name: PDFAnnotationPopup
desc: A PDFAnnotationPopup object provides user interactivity on a PDF page in the form of a pop-up menu.DeprecatedUse PDFAnnotationSubtype instead.

items.name: func isOpen() -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value indicating whether the pop-up is open.

items.name: func setIsOpen(Bool)
items.desc: Sets the open state of the pop-up menu.
